alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:11PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Albany and west central Laramie Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 610 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Horse Creek, or 14 miles east of Laramie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Crow Campground, Horse Creek and Federal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
